Title: AN ACT GRANTING TO ROBERTO AURELLANO A FRANCHISE TO INSTALL, OPERATE AND MAINTAIN AN ELECTRIC LIGHT, HEAT AND POWER SYSTEM IN HIE MUNICIPALITY OF CURRIMAO, PROVINCE OF ILOCOS NORTE, PHILIPPINE ISLANDS.
Data:
[ Act No. 3981, December 03, 1932 ]
AN ACT GRANTING TO ROBERTO AURELLANO A FRANCHISE TO INSTALL, OPERATE AND MAINTAIN AN ELECTRIC LIGHT, HEAT AND POWER SYSTEM IN HIE MUNICIPALITY OF CURRIMAO, PROVINCE OF ILOCOS NORTE, PHILIPPINE ISLANDS.
Be it enacted by the Senate and House of Representatives of the Philippines in Legislature assembled and by the authority of the same:
Section 1. Subject to the rules and conditions established in Act Numbered Thirty-six hundred and thirty-six, there is hereby granted to Roberto Aurellano, for a period of fifty years from the approval of this Act, the right, privilege and authority to construct, maintain and operate an electric light, heat and power system for the purpose of generating and distributing electric light, heat, and power, for sale within the limits of the municipality of Currimao, Province of Ilocos Norte, Philippine Islands.1a—àphi1
Section 2. This Act shall take effect on its approval.
Approved December 3, 1932.
